price: Ɛberε a wͻbehunu sε ato (wͻn awie) no, boniayεfoͻ no anim bεyε awerεho (anaasε mͻbͻmͻbͻ), na yεbεka akyerε wͻn sε: “Woi na na morefrε (sε εmmra mosoͻ) no.
arabic: فَلَمَّا رَأَوۡهُ زُلۡفَةٗ سِيٓـَٔتۡ وُجُوهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَقِيلَ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَدَّعُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: falammā ra-awhu zul'fatan sīat wujūhu alladhīna kafarū waqīla hādhā alladhī kuntum bihi taddaʿūna
